data.title: The Beverly Hills Hotel from $1,125. Beverly Hills Hotel Deals & Reviews
data.meta_description: Compare prices and find the best deal for the Beverly Hills Hotel in Beverly Hills (California) on KAYAK. Rates from $1,125.
data.text:
10WonderfulAnonymous, Oct 2017

Pros. What can I say, this is THE hotel of Beverly Hills.. Nothing else compares!! We travel ALLOT, NYC, etc, and NOTHING compares to the Beverly Hills Hotel.. When you stay here, you feel special.. Every stay we have seen numerous movie stars.. Just common place here.. The staff makes you feel special even if you are not... Just the best overall experience of ANY hotel by a long shot.. We are here almost every month.. It is an unbelievable experience!! I can't say enough about the staff... Ruth in the fountain Coffee Room is the best!! We just love her!! The valet staff, unreal as well.. asked my wife by name if she wanted her car.. I have no idea how he knew her name.. We never had him previously... Just amazing!! Makes a common person feel like a star!! Yes It's pretty expensive, but the experience is way worth it.. I just Can't say enough about This iconic LA hotel. It's a experience like no other... In my opinion, and my wifes, the best hotel we have stayed at WORLDWIDE!! And its practically in our backyard!! Just the best hotel we have personally stayed at in ANY country... LOVE IT!!

Opt for a Room with a View

Several guests mentioned that the views from the rooms were spectacular. Opting for a room with a balcony facing the fountain comes highly recommended.

Enjoy the Historic Surroundings

The hotel's location amidst ancient palm trees and lush gardens provides a serene and picturesque atmosphere, perfect for leisurely walks and relaxation.

Indulge in the Spa Services

Guests appreciated the spa room for its massages, facials, and weekly yoga classes. Consider booking a rejuvenating spa treatment during your stay.

Explore Nearby Attractions

The hotel's proximity to Will Rogers Memorial Park, the Frederick R. Weisman Art Foundation, and Virginia Robinson Gardens offers convenient access to cultural and natural attractions.

Dine at the Fountain Coffee Room

Guests enjoyed the 1950s-style counter service and the breakfast, lunch, and dinner options at the on-site Fountain Coffee Room. It's a must-visit for a nostalgic dining experience.

Consider Special Requests

Some guests recommended making specific requests for room features or services, such as requesting a room with a balcony or communicating preferences to the concierge for a more personalized experience.

Be Mindful of Pricing

While the hotel offers exceptional service and a beautiful atmosphere, some guests found certain amenities and dining options to be pricey. It's advisable to be mindful of the overall cost during your stay.

Plan Ahead for Dining

To avoid potential challenges with securing a table, especially at the Polo Lounge, consider making reservations in advance to ensure a seamless dining experience.

Embrace the Iconic Heritage

Embrace the historical significance of the hotel and its iconic status, which contributes to its unique charm and character. Take time to appreciate the heritage and class of the property.

Engage with the Staff

Many guests praised the exceptional service and friendliness of the staff. Engaging with the staff and utilizing their expertise can enhance your overall experience during your stay.
